auth.summary: Login or register to Loopring Pay to start sending and receiving crypto right away.
auth.login.proceed.message: Please pay attention to pending requests in Metamask. In some cases a popup won't appear. Click on the button below to continue.
auth.login.proceed.button.title: Continue
auth.register.proceed.message.1: The registration consists in tying your on-chain Ethereum address to the Loopring Pay L2 system. The process usually takes from 5 to 30 minutes to fully complete.
auth.register.proceed.message.2: Please pay attention to pending requests in Metamask. In some cases a popup won't appear. Click on the button below to continue.
auth.register.proceed.button.title: Continue
auth.register.confirmation.message: Your transaction has been broadcast to the network. Once the request is processed you'll be able to login into your newly-created account. You can monitor the transaction by clicking on the button below (opens in a new page).
auth.register.confirmation.button.title: View on Etherscan
dashboard.assets.empty: No asset matches the search criteria...
dashboard.transactions.empty.search: No transaction matches the search criteria...
deposit.allowance.message: Before performing a {tokenSymbol} deposit on Loopring, you need to give us permission to move tokens on your behalf on-chain (this is a one-time operation, and you can revoke the permission whenever you want).
deposit.allowance.button.title: Grant allowance
deposit.allowance.confirmation.message: Your transaction has been broadcast to the network. Once confirmed, you'll be able to deposit your {tokenSymbol} and transfer them at light-speed on Loopring Pay. You can monitor the transaction by clicking on the button below (opens in a new page).
deposit.confirmation.message: Your transaction has been broadcast to the network. Once confirmed, in a few minutes you'll be able to transfer your {tokenSymbol} at light-speed on Loopring Pay. You can monitor the transaction by clicking on the button below (opens in a new page).
deposit.confirmation.button.title: View on Etherscan
withdrawal.confirmation.message: Your transaction has been broadcast to the network. Once the request is processed (it could take up to a few days), you'll be able to use your funds securely, on chain. You can monitor the transaction by clicking on the button below (opens in a new page).
withdrawal.confirmation.button.title: View on Etherscan
error.loopring.initialization: There was an error initializing Loopring Pay. Please try again later.
error.loopring.supported.tokens: There was an error fetching the list of Loopring Pay's supported tokens. Please try again later.
error.loopring.user.balances: There was an error fetching the user's balances. Please try again later.
error.loopring.deposit.balance: There was an error fetching the user's maximum depositable balance. Please try again.
error.loopring.token.transactions: There was an error fetching previous token transactions. Please try again later.
error.loopring.transfer: There was an error performing the transfer. Please try again later.
error.loopring.token.allowance.get: There was an error fetching the on-chain token allowance. Please try again later.
error.loopring.token.allowance.grant: There was an error granting on-chain token allowance. Please try again later.
error.loopring.deposit: There was an error performing the deposit. Please try again later.
error.loopring.register: There was an error registering the new account. Please try again later.
error.loopring.withdrawal: There was an error performing the on-chain withdrawal. Please try again later.
error.web3.initialization: There was an error initializing web3. Please try again later.
warn.account.not.found: Seems like this account is not yet on our platform. Please register first.
warn.register.existing.account: Seems like you already own a Loopring Pay account. Please login to start using it.
